mapper.select: select * from coupon c, (select partner_no, member_id, partner_name from partner where member_id=#{member_id}) p where c.partner_no = p.partner_no and coupon_discount = '50' and coupon_yn='Y' order by coupon_discount desc

select * from coupon c, (select partner_no, member_id, partner_name from partner where member_id=#{member_id}) p where c.partner_no = p.partner_no and coupon_discount < '50' and coupon_yn='Y' order by coupon_discount desc
